content:
/>
VIII.iv.3.C.5.g
.
Requesting Examinations for Supplemental IU Claims
Do not
routinely
re-examine disabilities associated with the supplemental IU claim.  For those disabilities claimed to be associated with IU that are
in supplemental claim status, follow the procedures in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 2.A.2.g
, and
newly raised and within scope of the supplemental IU claim, follow the procedures in
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 3.B.2.b
.
Reference
:  For more information on duty to assist in requesting examinations, see
M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, 1.A
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
